about_the_game:
Dark forces threaten the peaceful realm of Valora, and its villages cry out for protection. Answer the call as a legendary hero tasked with defending the realm's most vulnerable settlements. In this strategic turn-based deck-building game, your decisions will determine the fate of countless lives.

STRATEGIC DEPTH

  • Construct powerful structures, from mighty towers to specialized resource buildings

  • Deploy and command diverse troops with unique abilities

  • Manage crucial resources including Wood, Stone, Iron, and Gold to fund your defensive efforts

DECK-BUILDING MASTERY

  • Build your perfect deck through strategic card acquisition

  • Unlock powerful new buildings, troops, and abilities as you progress

  • Discover synergistic combinations that enhance your defensive capabilities

  • Adapt your strategy with specialized cards that complement your chosen hero's strengths

EPIC JOURNEY

  • Navigate your path through different villages

  • Face increasingly challenging threats as you venture deeper into corrupted territories

  • Confront and defeat powerful bosses

DYNAMIC GAMEPLAY

  • Every playthrough offers unique challenges and opportunities

  • Multiple viable strategies for victory

  • Progressive difficulty scaling that tests your mastery of game mechanics

name: Kingdom Fortress
short_description: Command powerful heroes in this turn-based, deck-building village defense game. Build strategic fortifications, deploy loyal troops, and protect settlements across the realm of Valora. Manage resources, unlock powerful cards, and lead your forces against the encroaching darkness.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish
